translations: 不忠的；不忠诚的；背叛的

sentences.sentence: She was so disloyal to her deputy she made his position untenable.
sentences.translation: 她对她的副手如此不忠诚，以至于弄得他的职位岌岌可危。

sentences.sentence: He was accused of being disloyal to the government.
Accusing us of being disloyal to cover his own sorry behaviour is truly execrable.
sentences.translation: 用指控我们的不忠来掩盖他个人的不当行为真是很恶劣。
